description.full: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, German, Czech, Finnish, Russian, Swedish.  Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu.  NHL 15 brings together a generation of EA SPORTS innovation into one complete hockey package.  All-new commentary duo, Mike ‘Doc’ Emrick and Eddie Olczyk call the game in the most jam-packed hockey experience ever.
description.short: NHL 15 brings together a generation of EA SPORTS innovation into one complete hockey package.  All-new commentary duo, Mike ‘Doc’ Emrick and Eddie Olczyk call the game in the most jam-packed hockey experience ever.
